import React from 'react' import {useRouteMatch} from "react-router-dom"; import PRODUCTS from '../products' function ChangeState(){ } function ProductDetails(props){ let ProdArray = Object.values(PRODUCTS) const match = useRouteMatch() if(match){ ProdArray = ProdArray.filter(prod => { return prod.id === match.params.id }) } let prod = ProdArray[0] console.log(ProdArray) return(



{prod.name}

{prod.description}

) } export default ProductDetails
